creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: left, cursive jizuri: 自摺　大正拾四年作 {Jizuri, Taishō jūyonen saku} | bottom, in ink: To my friend Col. H. E. Robison  博 Tokio June 8th, 1946 | bottom, in pencil: Mt. Rainier | Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LLC, red artist's seal F: (five-pointed Antennaria floral pattern)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and colors on paper
portfolio: Untitled series known as The United States
title: Mount Rainier
